Button Class Reference
Button Access

Button API. More...

#include <Button.hpp>

Detailed Description

This is a static class that provides direct access to button presses. This class is not used in normal situations because button presses are converted to events. If you need finer access to the buttons you can use this API during an Element::UPDATE event.

Here is an example of using the Button API.

#include <cstdio>
#include <fogo/Button.hpp>
if( Button::left_pressed() > Button::short_press() ){
printf("Left Button pressed\n");
}
if( Button::left_held() > Button::long_press() ){
printf("Holding left for a long time\n");
}

The "pressed" functions only return non-zero one time for each button press. For example:

printf("Left Button %ld, %ld\n", Button::left_pressed(), Button::left_pressed());

will output the following assuming the left button is pressed for 53ms before the code is executed: 

Left Button 53, 0

enum  button {
  TOP = FOGO_HIO_BUTTON_MAIN,
  LEFT = FOGO_HIO_BUTTON_LEFT,
  CENTER = FOGO_HIO_BUTTON_CENTER,
  RIGHT = FOGO_HIO_BUTTON_RIGHT
}

 System short press length in ms.
 
static int long_press ()
 System long press length in ms.
 
static int held (enum button which)
 Returns greater than zero if button is held.
 
static bool held (enum button which, int interval)
 Returns true if button is held for interval (returns true once per button press)
 
static int pressed (enum button which)
 Returns length of previous button press.
 
static bool double_pressed (enum button which)
 Returns true if a double press was detected.
 
static int top_held ()
 Duration in ms top button has been held (zero if not being pushed)
 
static int left_held ()
 Duration in ms left button has been held (zero if not being pushed)
 
static int right_held ()
 Duration in ms right button has been held (zero if not being pushed)
 
static int center_held ()
 Duration in ms center button has been held (zero if not being pushed)
 
static bool top_held (int interval)
 Returns true if top button has been held for interval.
 
static bool left_held (int interval)
 Returns true if left button has been held for interval.
 
static bool right_held (int interval)

 Returns true if right button has been held for interval.

static int right_pressed ()
